articles.author: Rachel Treisman
articles.title: The U.S. confirms its first human case of New World screwworm. What is it? - NPR
articles.description: U.S. officials confirmed a case of the flesh-eating parasite in a person who traveled from El Salvador. Screwworm typically affects cattle in South America, but has spread north in recent years.
articles.content: The U.S. has confirmed its first human case of the New World screwworm, a flesh-eating parasite whose northward creep from South America has put the country's cattle industry on high alert in recent … [+7800 chars]

articles.author: Jay Ganglani, The Associated Press
articles.title: France summons U.S. Ambassador Kushner over antisemitism letter - NBC News
articles.description: France has summoned the American ambassador to Paris after he wrote a letter to President Emmanuel Macron alleging that the country had not taken “sufficient action” to combat antisemitism.
articles.content:
LONDON France has summoned the American ambassador to Paris after he wrote a letter to President Emmanuel Macron alleging that the country had not taken sufficient action to combat antisemitism.
